name: hours
description: A simplified encoding of a venue's hours of operation. This is not designed to capture every edge case or exception, just daily hours with open/close times. The value is encoded as a dictionary with three-letter day abbreviations (sun, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat) as keys. Each day value is a dictionary with open and close keys, and values are composed of 24-hour format time like 09:30 or 16:45.
